backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing blog posts with create, fetch, list, and search functions using an in-memory map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing home, blog, about, and all five new blog post URLs.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when blog posts change.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, blog list, blog posts, and about pages.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Blog post preview card showing title, date, excerpt, and link to the post.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Home page hero section with banner image, headline, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with about text, navigation links, social icons, and Â© MHS Habibur Blog notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: Renders a styled placeholder box for different ad variants with an icon and labels.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a placeholder affiliate card with title, description, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: Sets document title and meta tags for SEO, Open Graph, Twitter cards, and canonical URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, fetch by slug, and search blog posts with fallback data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, state, and provider context using the Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, warm color variables, typography, and blog prose formatting.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Provides sample blog posts used when backend data is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Exports global site metadata including name, description, URL, and default image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with biography, expertise, contact info, and social links, including ad placeholders and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with loading and error states, plus SEO metadata and an ad banner.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with date, content, ads, affiliate section, error handling, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home landing page with hero section, feature cards, latest blog CTA, and an ad banner.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, plugins, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, and state for a responsive SEO-friendly blog site.
